mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, writer_id, board_id, content, created_date, update_date, user.nickname FROM comment LEFT JOIN user ON comment.writer_id=user.id WHERE board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(writer_id, board_id, content, created_date, update_date) VALUES(#{writer_Id}, #{board_Id}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content=#{content}, update_date=DEFAULT WHERE comment_id=#{comment_Id}
